resources:
Sakinah SettingsActivity Fajr Dhur Asr Maghrib Isha Jumah Settings Button Enable location permission to calculate prayer times directly. The app only uses your location when its in the foreground. Set location icon Request location permissions Or set the location manually in settings Please enable (Do Not Disturb) access in settings for the app to function correctly. Do Not Disturb permission icon Go to (Do Not Disturb) Settings Please allow location access permissions for the app to calculate prayer times and function correctly. Location Permission has been permanently declined. Go to app settings to allow it. Please allow notification/Do Not Disturb access to be able to manage audio volume during prayer times Do Not Disturb access has been permanently declined, Go to app settings to allow it Due to restrictions by the system, the app will be killed in the background and won\'t be able to silence during prayer times. Please allow autostart permission Enable Autostart Open app settings Auto start icon Back to home page Settings Set Location Set the location used to calculate prayer times. Location Update Frequency Set how frequently the prayer and location data should be updated. Enable Notifications Enable it to get feedback and information about app state Switch to vibrate Enable the switch to set ringer mode to vibration instead of silent during prayer times. Prayer Calculation Method Set the method used for prayer time calculations. Hanafi Asr Prayer Use the Hanafi Asr prayer times High Latitude Adjustment Select the type of adjustment needed to correctly calculate prayer times in higher latitude areas. Select the prayer calculation method Select the high latitude adjustment method Select the location update frequency Umm Al-Qura, Makkah Muslim World League Islamic Society of North America University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi
Jafari Egypt Tehran None Midnight One-Seventh of night Angle-based Every hour Every 4 hours Every 12 Hours Every 24 hours Set time period to silence phone for %s prayer Phone will be silenced from after adhan before adhan until Confirm OK Cancel Click the button to get your location Get Location Note: Setting location manually disables location updates Enter your city in English No result Permission denied Basic Settings Prayer Settings SilenceTimer Silence Period Active Silence Timer Notification Silence period is activated for %s prayer Loading… About On Off Re-enable app to change your preferences Information regarding app and developer Error Notifications Displays when an error occurs Information Notifications Displays information for the user regarding app statusRR Work Notifications Displays when the silence period is active Manage Notifications Could not load prayer times Alarms permission is still denied. it is required for the app to schedule exact trigger times for the silence period. Please enable it or you will experience inaccurate triggering time. Opens the app notification management page in system settings Error: No data found Could not load data to start silence timer. Error: Wrong Time Calculations Please check you date, time and timezone settings and reopen the app.
Request notifications permission Notifications has been permanently declined. Open notification settings to enable it. Permission has been denied. Notifications are optional to provide you with information about the app state in the background. Click OK to request again. Don\'t show again Additional Settings Start Finish Minutes
A minute
%d Minutes
hour
%d hours
Enable Scheduling Alarms Permission It is essential for the app to be able to schedule alarms for precise timing of silence periods. Enable Alarms Enable Do Not Disturb Permission Enable Location Permissions Highly Recommended Duration An application to mute your phone during prayer times to avoid distractions in your prayers Developed by: Ahmed Alahmary AKA Sypers by Additional resources The app needs to disable battery optimization to run at least daily. It only runs a few times in the background for light tasks. If you don\'t disable it the app might not work the next day. Turn off app battery optimization Battery optimization prevent the app from working in the background for a long time. Please disable it so the app can function correctly. Open battery optimization settings Rate us Give us a rating and express your experience and suggestions. Can\'t start review, please try again later. Location updated hours Every On Adhan Always-on Notification A permanent notification to keep the app running in the background. Currently enabled Shutdown Update Update successful Update failed! default Disable Pause App Activity Additional App Icons Notification sounds Enter your location Location not found! Searching… Operations Notifications Notifies of operations being done by the app. Updating… Updating app data. Languages Select your preferred app language Retry Error Getting Location, Please check your location settings. Or switch to manual location in app settings Select your desired app language Back to settings Want to help translate the app? Visit this GitHub repository for more info.

en

Please turn on your location. Use Alternative Scheduling Enable to use an alternative scheduling method which makes trigger time more percise but may use more battery power. You should enable it if the silence timer starts late. Share the app Share the app with other social platfroms Check out (Sakinah):\nAn Android app to mute your phone automatically during islamic prayer times.\nGet it on Google Play Store:\nhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dev.sakinah Theme System Default Material You Light Material You Dark Light Dark Choose your desired app theme.
